description: Building on its expertise dating back more than 120 years, VINCI Construction has developed comprehensive capabilities covering the entire water cycle, including standout expertise in areas such as drinking water pumping and supply, wastewater treatment and discharge, rainwater management and dam design, construction and maintenance.
name: Water infrastructure
